indexDesc: Here you can perform on-chain operations related to the MoonDAO community.
indexCard:
Lock your $MOONEY to obtain voting power and help govern MoonDAO.
Voting power is required to vote on MoonDAO proposals through Snapshot.
lockTitle: Voting power enables governance for MoonDAO through Snapshot.
lockDesc: You will always have the same amount of $MOONEY, regardless of your lock.
lockAmountDesc: This is the total amount you are locking, including the amount already locked.
lockAmountNote: ** Note, both lock amount and expiration date cannot be increased at once **
lockDesc2: If you have already locked $MOONEY, you may only extend the lock time.
lockBalance: Your final balance will be approx
expDesc: Your previous lock has expired, you need to withdraw
safetyNote: For safety reasons, we recommend you limit your token allowance to the amount you plan to deposit in the near future.
welcomeDesc: Welcome to the future of space exploration with MoonDAO! Be part of our community-driven initiative to democratize access to space and accelerate our multiplanetary future. Mission Control is your gateway to all things MoonDAO.
joinDesc: Joining MoonDAO is now easier than ever with a simple login, wallet creation, and onboarding flow that will walk you through everything you need to join our borderless, permissionless community.
governanceDesc: MoonDAO is governed by the community. Here you can export your embedded wallet, acquire and stake $MOONEY, prove personhood, and vote on MoonDAO proposals.
marketplaceDesc: Your gateway to digital collectibles, space training experiences, products, and once-in-a-lifetime opportunities like our Ticket to Space sweepstakes.
analyticsDesc: Fully transparent stats and analytics related to our community and the MoonDAO Treasury, including total holdings and all transactions.
eventsDesc: Get involved with MoonDAO by attending one of our upcoming online events or find out how you can contribute to our ambitious plans by helping out on a project.
